name: Siva Sambath Mudaliar
title: Go Developer with attention to detail and performance focus. Hands on experience building scalable backends, REST/gRPC APIs, cloud native microservices.
bio: My name is Siva, and I'm a Go developer focused on building scalable, high-performance microservices. I specialize in REST/gRPC APIs, AWS, and Kubernetes, with strong skills in CI/CD automation and troubleshooting production systems. Take a look at a few of my projects to see what Iâ€™m all about!
